name: Kuu Alpine Mach Rub-On Glide Wax
description: Sometimes you don’t have the time or the temperament for hot waxing. Go smooth and simple with these rub-on waxes for your alpine boards. Each has its own cork attached at the back for finishing.Three colour / temperature ranges: Yellow (moist) -5°C and warmer, Green (cold) -9°C and colder, Red (universal) -5°C to -9°C.
